caption: Battista Franco (Italian, 1498/1510–1580), formerly attributed to Perino del Vaga (Pietro Buonaccorsi) (Italian, 1501–1547), Seated allegorical figure with sword and crown, ostrich, helmets, mitre and putti carrying headgear. Pen and brown ink with brush and light tan wash on gray-brown paper; 21.6 x 16.1 cm. Gift of Frank Jewett Mather Jr. (x1952-168)
